mapper.update: update ac_system_wallet_address set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chain = #{chain,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from ac_system_wallet_address order by id desc
